text: Montreuil is a town in the east suburbs of Paris, France. Montreuil is near the Bois de Vincennes park in the ÃŽle-de-France region and the Seine-Saint- Denis department. About 91,000 people lived there in 1999. It is the third most populated suburb of Paris (after Boulogne-Billancourt and Argenteuil). ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Communes in Seine-Saint-Denis
title: Montreuil, Seine-Saint-Denis
